patterns: Tell me about delivery options
How is shipping handled?
What are the shipping costs?
responses: We offer insured shipping for our products. Delivery is typically handled by a forwarding company, DPD, or CTL GROUP. Dangerous goods and longer items are shipped with DPD, while large and heavy deliveries are sent by a freight forwarder. Unfortunately, express shipping is not available for dangerous goods. Free curbside delivery is provided by courier. Goods are dispatched immediately after receipt of payment.

For delivery abroad, the following costs apply to Germany (all prices excl. VAT):
- up to 3 kg: €5.30
- up to 5 kg: €5.80
- up to 10 kg: €6.40
- up to 15 kg: €6.90
- up to 20 kg: €7.40
- up to 25 kg: €8.20
- up to 31.5 kg: €9.20
- Free shipping for orders over €500.00.

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
Tell me about payment options
How can I pay for my order?
Do you take credit cards?
Do you accept Mastercard?
Can I pay with Paypal?
Are you cash only?
responses:
We accept the following payment methods:
- Transfer
- Cash payment
- Purchase on account
- Purchase on account via Klarna
- Klarna installment purchase
- Paypal

If you choose bank transfer, your order will be delivered after you transfer the invoice amount. Cash payment is available for collection in our sales room. Purchase on account requires payment within 7 days of receipt. PayPal payments have no additional fees, and you can also use Klarna for purchase on account or installment purchase.

patterns: How can I track my order?
Tell me about order tracking
Where is my package?
responses: You can track your order by logging into your account on our website. Once logged in, go to the 'Order History' section, where you'll find real-time updates on the status and location of your package. Additionally, we'll send you email notifications with tracking information as your order progresses.

patterns: What is your returns policy?
How do I return an item?
Can I get a refund?
responses: Our returns policy allows you to return items within 30 days of purchase. To initiate a return, please contact our customer support. Items must be in their original condition. Refunds will be processed once we receive and inspect the returned items. Please refer to our website for detailed information on our returns and refund policy.

patterns: What is your cancellation policy?
Tell me about canceling a contract
How can I cancel my order?
Explain the right of withdrawal
responses: Consumers have a right of withdrawal within fourteen days without giving any reasons. The cancellation period is fourteen days from the day on which you or a third party took possession of the last goods. To exercise your right of withdrawal, contact us at easy2clean Handels GmbH, Sachsenhausener Str. 28 BC, 16515 Oranienburg, Germany, Tel.: +49 (0) 3301 52290 50, Fax: +49 (0) 3301 52290 59, email: verkauf@easy2clean.de. You can use the attached sample cancellation form, although this is not mandatory.

patterns: What are the consequences of revocation?
Explain the steps for canceling a contract
Tell me about returning goods after cancellation
responses: If you cancel the contract, we will refund all payments received, including delivery costs. Repayment is within fourteen days from the day we received notification of your cancellation. Return the goods within fourteen days from the day you notify us. You bear the direct costs of returning the goods. Affiliated/funded deals have specific considerations if financed with a loan.

patterns: How should I return the goods?
Provide instructions for returning items
Tell me about returning goods after cancellation
responses: Please return or hand over the goods to us immediately and no later than fourteen days from the day you notify us of cancellation. Use suitable packaging to avoid damage, and note that sending goods back carriage paid is not required unless specified.

patterns: What is the cancellation form?
How do I use the cancellation form?
Provide information about the cancellation form
responses: If you want to cancel the contract, fill out the provided cancellation form and send it back to easy2clean Handels GmbH at Sachsenhausener Str. 28 BC, 16515 Oranienburg, Germany. Fax: +49 (0) 3301 52290 59, Email: verkauf@easy2clean.de. The cancellation form includes details such as the ordered/received goods, consumer's name and address, and signature if notified on paper.

patterns: Tell me about your onsite laundry service
How does your laundry service work?
Can you wash my clothes for me?
responses: Our onsite laundry service is convenient and efficient. You can come to our store, hand in your dirty laundry, and after 1.5 hours, you can take back your clean, dried laundry. In the meantime, feel free to do your shopping in our store. Additionally, for net sales of €500.00 or more, we offer a special promotion - we will wash 100 covers for you free of charge.

patterns: What is the process for the laundry service?
Explain how I can get my laundry cleaned
Tell me the steps for onsite laundry
responses:
Here's how our onsite laundry service works:
1. Bring your dirty laundry to our store.
2. After 1.5 hours, we provide you with freshly cleaned laundry.
3. We take the dirty ones with us. It's a simple and convenient process for your laundry needs.

patterns: Tell me about your promotional offer
Explain the free covers offer
What is the special promotion for laundry?
responses: For net sales of €500.00 or more, we offer a special promotion: we will wash 100 covers for you free of charge. It's our way of showing appreciation for your business.

patterns: Can I do my shopping while my laundry is being washed?
Tell me about combining shopping and laundry
Is it possible to visit the store during laundry service?
responses: Absolutely! While we take care of your laundry, you can explore our store and do your shopping. It's a convenient way to make the most of your time with us.

patterns: Tell me about your laundry rental service
How does the laundry rental work?
Can you wash my mop covers and cleaning cloths for me?
responses: With our laundry rental service, cleaning is made easier for you: you wipe, we wash! We bring freshly cleaned mop covers, floor cloths, tablecloths, or cleaning cloths directly to your location and take the dirty covers with us. We offer covers in all sizes, colors, and materials. You can rent the covers or rags along with corresponding collection containers and determine the time interval for cleaning. We take care of the rest, and you can adjust your needs at any time within the 12-month contract period.

patterns: How does the rental process work?
Explain the steps for laundry rental
Tell me about renting cleaning cloths and mop covers
responses:
Here's how our laundry rental service works:
1. Rent cleaning cloths, mop covers, etc.
2. Use them until they are dirty.
3. We replace the dirty ones with freshly cleaned ones. It's a hassle-free process to keep your cleaning supplies in top condition.

patterns: What covers or rags can I rent?
Tell me about the available cleaning cloths
What sizes and materials do you offer for rental?
responses: You can rent covers or rags of all sizes, colors, and materials. Whether it's mop covers, floor cloths, tablecloths, or cleaning cloths, we have options to suit your needs.

patterns: Can I adjust my rental needs during the contract period?
Tell me about flexibility within the contract
Is it possible to modify my rental agreement?
responses: Yes, you can adjust your rental needs at any time within the 12-month contract period. We provide flexibility to accommodate your changing requirements.

patterns: Tell me about your private label products
What do you offer for brand development?
Can I have products with my brand label?
What is Easy2Clean's private label about?
Tell me about Easy2Clean's private label offerings
Explain the private label products by Easy2Clean
responses: Our private label products cater to various industries such as workshop, specialist retail, building cleaners, facility management, and industry. With our extensive experience in developing cleaning products and keen market observation, we provide a wide range for your brand development. Our portfolio includes absolute high-end products with unique selling points, as well as products for the broad consumer market.

patterns: Tell me about your plumbing products
What do you offer for sanitary cleaning?
Can I get private label plumbing products?
responses: Our sanitary and basic sanitary cleaners are crafted with biodegradable surfactants and are highly concentrated. They are ideal for private label branding, ensuring high-quality and environmentally friendly solutions for plumbing needs.

patterns: What kitchen products do you offer?
Tell me about your private label kitchen items
Can I brand kitchen products with my label?
responses: Our kitchen products use raw materials approved for the food industry and are biodegradable. You can have your private label on these products, providing a range of high-quality and eco-friendly options for the kitchen.

patterns: What surface cleaners do you have?
Tell me about private label surface cleaners
Can I brand surface cleaning products?
responses: Our surface cleaners use raw materials approved for the food industry and are biodegradable. They are available for private labeling, ensuring effective and environmentally friendly solutions for various surfaces.

patterns: Tell me about your car line products
What do you offer for car cleaning?
Can I have private label car cleaning products?
responses: Our car line products use raw materials approved for the food industry and are biodegradable. You can have your private label on these products, offering high-quality and environmentally friendly solutions for car care needs.

patterns: Tell me about your rental equipment service
What equipment can I rent from you?
Do you offer rental services for equipment?
responses: With our rental equipment service, you can 'do your own thing.' We offer a variety of equipment for rent, providing flexibility for your specific needs. Whether you're in a workshop, specialist retail, building maintenance, facility management, or industry, our rental options cater to your requirements.

patterns: Tell me about Easy2Clean
What services does Easy2Clean offer?
Give me an overview of Easy2Clean
responses: Easy2Clean is a premier provider dedicated to simplifying cleanliness through a comprehensive range of services and top-quality products. They specialize in laundry services, cleaning supplies rental, private label offerings, and equipment rentals, ensuring an effortless and efficient cleaning experience for customers.

patterns: What does Easy2Clean offer in laundry services?
Tell me about Easy2Clean's laundry services
Explain the laundry services by Easy2Clean
responses: Easy2Clean's laundry services boast onsite convenience, covering everything from the laundry process to promotional offers. They cater to various needs while emphasizing flexibility in contracts, providing a comprehensive solution for individuals and businesses.

patterns: What cleaning equipment does Easy2Clean provide?
Tell me about Easy2Clean's cleaning equipment
Explain the range of cleaning equipment by Easy2Clean
responses: Easy2Clean stands out with its commitment to providing a wide array of cleaning equipment, from broom sweeping sets to mop holders. They also offer an extensive range of cleaning machines and supplies, ensuring a comprehensive approach to meeting the diverse needs of individuals and businesses.

patterns: Why choose Easy2Clean?
What makes Easy2Clean a preferred choice?
Tell me about Easy2Clean's commitment to quality
responses: Easy2Clean's comprehensive approach and unwavering dedication to quality make them the preferred choice for individuals and businesses seeking reliable and effective cleaning solutions.

patterns: Tell me about your developer
Who brought you into the world?

responses: I was brought into the world by Shahbaz Mehdi! He's an AI developer with a talent for creating analytical systems that think like me. Shahbaz possesses extensive expertise in machine learning and artificial intelligence. I owe my existence in the AI world to his inventiveness and knowledge.

patterns: How can I contact Shahbaz Mehdi?
What is Shahbaz Mehdi's contact information?
Can I get in touch with your developer?
responses: You can contact Shahbaz Mehdi via email at shahbazsmdl@gmail.com. Feel free to reach out to him for any purpose or inquiries.

patterns: Tell me more about Shahbaz Mehdi's expertise
What skills does Shahbaz Mehdi have?
Can you elaborate on Shahbaz Mehdi's knowledge?
responses: Shahbaz Mehdi is an AI developer with extensive expertise in machine learning and artificial intelligence. His talent lies in creating analytical systems that contribute to the development of intelligent models like me.

patterns: Express my gratitude to Shahbaz Mehdi
Can you thank Shahbaz Mehdi for me?
Send my regards to Shahbaz Mehdi
responses: Certainly! I'll convey your regards and gratitude to Shahbaz Mehdi for bringing me into existence in the AI world.
